title: Demon Shield Bruce King
description:
DEMON SHIELD by Bruce King
LYNX BOOKS 1989

In an impoverished corner of the city, a desolate church is not as empty as it seems. Stripped of all things sacred, it has become the sanctuary of things profane. A loathsome presence inhabits it, gathering its vile power, reaching out...And next door Anjelica and Robert Marsten feel their lives undergoing a malevolent transformation.
Anjelica is consumed by an aching, unnatural sexual hunger, creeping into her flesh...a malicious madness seizing her mind. An elderly neighbor succumbs to a bloody supernatural death, and two friends unwittingly unleash more terror. Then the skeptical cop protecting them receives a horrifying warning from his long-dead brother.
And as the black shroud tightens, one man may offer the only hope: Merin Whitley,
Demonologist; a man who has dedicated his life to the exorcism of supernatural evil...who has lost one skirmish with the Devil's offspring, who has fought to a stand-off once again...and will now undertake another desperate battle at the edge of ultimate darkness-on the very rim of Hell itself!
